description.en:
This product is a structured product, which is divided into class A share and class B share. The two shares have different yield characteristics and different net value calculation rules. Class A share is preferred share with low risk and stable earnings. Class B share is defered share with higher risks and relatively higher yield. During the duration, the net assets of this fund shall give priority to ensuring the cumulative agreed yield of BKEX Taihe stable A share; BKEX Taihe stable B share is a fund share with higher risk and relatively higher expected yield, and the remaining net assets shall be counted as the net assets of class B share after giving priority to ensuring the principal and cumulative agreed yield of class a share.

THA is equivalent token of class A share of KEX - Taihe Stable-strategy Structured Closed-end Fund. 1 THA = 1 class A share. Class A share is preferred share with low risk and stable earnings. During the duration, the net assets of this fund shall give priority to ensuring the cumulative agreed yield of BKEX Taihe stable A share.
